Open Banking UK Public APIs

This is a single toolbox for working with the public resources available as part of the UK Open Banking. These are all of the resources that do not require authentication, and are using the common UK Open Banking API format.

Individual Banking APIs

These are the public APIs available for banks in the UK, providing access to the common resources that are available across banks in the UK, as mandated by the government. You can find documentation, Postman collections, and monitoring data for each API below.

The public business accounts API for Adam & Company.

API Specifications

These are the API specifications that are used to define, document, and validate the APIs included within this industry toolbox.

APIs.json

This toolbox uses an APIs.json file to index the entire set of APIs, and the specifications that define them. Providing a single machine readable index of all the moving parts of this industry toolbox, including the details of each API, but also everything that supports them.

Visit Website Visit APIs.json

OpenAPI

Postman leverages the OpenAPI specification as the contract for each API being delivered or consumed, providing a single definition for each API being delivered and put to work in applications and integrations.

Visit Website Visit APIs.json
ATM Locator - Contract View OpenAPI
Branch Locator - Contract View OpenAPI
Business Accounts - Contract View OpenAPI
Commercial Credit Card Account - Contract View OpenAPI
Loans - Contract View OpenAPI

JSON Schema

Postman uses JSON Schema to validate JSON objects as part of the API lifecycle, and the request and response for each API being delivered or consumed, as well as part of each OpenAPI contract being managed.

Visit Website Visit APIs.json
ATM Locator - Schema View JSON Schema
Branch Locator - Schema View JSON Schema
Business Accounts - Schema View JSON Schema
Commercial Credit Card Account - Schema View JSON Schema
Loans - Schema View JSON Schema
Personal Accounts - Schema View JSON Schema

Postman Collections

Postman cocllections provide a machine readable representation of each APIs contracct, providing an executable representation of each API that can be used across the API lifecycle to mock, document, and test APIs.

Visit Website Visit APIs.json
ATM Locator - Contract Test Run in Postman
Branch Locator - Contract Test Run in Postman
Business Acccounts - Contract Test Run in Postman
Commercial Credit Card Accounts - Contract Test Run in Postman
Loans - Contract Test Run in Postman
Personal Accounts - Contract Test Run in Postman


About this Toolbox

This is a toolbox of APIs that runs as a website using GitHub pages, providing a simple, open source, and community driven approach to crowdsourcing and evolving a curated list of APIs, with accompanying documentation and Postman collections to help get developers started in the development of applications.

You can view a machine readable index of this API toolbox via the projects APIs.json file.
